呼.definition: to call; to cry; to shout; to breath out; to exhale

呼中.definition: Huzhong district of Daxing'anling prefecture 大興安嶺地區|大兴安岭地区, Heilongjiang

呼中區.definition: Huzhong district of Daxing'anling prefecture 大興安嶺地區|大兴安岭地区, Heilongjiang

呼之即來.definition: to come when called (idiom); ready and compliant; always at sb's beck and call

呼之即來，揮之即去.pinyin: hu1 zhi1 ji2 lai2 , hui1 zhi1 ji2 qu4
呼之即來，揮之即去.definition: to come when called (idiom); ready and compliant; always at sb's beck and call

呼之欲出.definition: lit. ready to appear at the call (idiom); fig. on the verge of coming out into the open; (of a person's choice etc) on the point of being disclosed; (of an artistic depiction) vividly portrayed

呼來喝去.definition: to call to come and shout to go (idiom); to yell orders; always bossing people around

呼倫貝爾.definition: see 呼倫貝爾市|呼伦贝尔市[Hu1lun2bei4er3 Shi4]

呼倫貝爾市.definition: Hulunbuir, prefecture-level city in Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区[Nei4meng3gu3 Zi4zhi4qu1]

呼倫貝爾草原.pinyin: Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3 cao3 yuan2

呼出.definition: to exhale; to breathe out; to make an outgoing call; (computing) to bring up (a menu, search bar, virtual keyboard etc)

呼叫.definition: to shout; to yell; (telecommunications) to call

呼吸器.definition: ventilator (artificial breathing apparatus used in hospitals)

呼呼.definition: (onom.) sound of the wind or the breathing of sb who is sound asleep

呼和浩特市.definition: Hohhot, prefecture-level city and capital of Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区[Nei4meng3gu3 Zi4zhi4qu1]

呼喚.definition: to call out (a name etc); to shout

呼嘯.definition: to whistle; to scream; to whiz

呼嘯而過.definition: to whistle past; to hurtle past; to zip by

呼嚎.definition: to roar (of animals); to wail; to cry out in distress; see also 呼號|呼号[hu1 hao2]

呼嚕.definition: (onom.) sound of snoring, wheezing or (cat's) purring

呼圖壁.definition: Hutubi county in Changji Hui autonomous prefecture 昌吉回族自治州[Chang1 ji2 Hui2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

呼圖壁縣.definition: Hutubi county in Changji Hui autonomous prefecture 昌吉回族自治州[Chang1 ji2 Hui2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

呼天搶地.definition: (idiom) to cry out to heaven and knock one's head against the ground (as an expression of anguish)

呼應.definition: to conform (with); to echo; to correlate well; (linguistics) agreement

呼朋引伴.definition: to gather one's friends; to band together

呼朋引類.definition: to call up all one's associates; rent-a-crowd

呼牛作馬.definition: to call sth a cow or a horse (idiom); it doesn't matter what you call it; Insult me if you want, I don't care what you call me.

呼牛呼馬.definition: to call sth a cow or a horse (idiom); it doesn't matter what you call it; Insult me if you want, I don't care what you call me.

呼瑪.definition: Huma county in Daxing'anling prefecture 大興安嶺地區|大兴安岭地区, Heilongjiang

呼瑪縣.definition: Huma county in Daxing'anling prefecture 大興安嶺地區|大兴安岭地区, Heilongjiang

呼籲.definition: to call on (sb to do sth); to appeal (to); an appeal

呼聲.definition: a shout; fig. opinion or demand, esp. expressed by a group

呼蘭.definition: Hulan district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang

呼蘭區.definition: Hulan district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang

呼號.definition: to wail; to cry out in distress

呼風喚雨.definition: to call the wind and summon the rain (idiom); to exercise magical powers; fig. to stir up troubles
